name: Splintered Oar
flavorText: "From Kingsport to Kurast we sail. From Lut Gholein to Skovos we roam. When the wind's not blowing, we'll row our damned way home!" —The Sea Trader's Song
flavorTextHtml: "From Kingsport to Kurast we sail. From Lut Gholein to Skovos we roam. When the wind's not blowing, we'll row our damned way home!" —The Sea Trader's Song
